content.question: Consider a change in the sample sizes such that a random sample of size 52 is selected from population X and a random sample of size 63 is selected from population Y. When all other things remain the same, what effect would such a change have on the interval?

choices.label: The width of the interval will increase.
The width of the interval will decrease.
The interval will contain no negative numbers.
The level of confidence will increase.

content.answer: The width of the interval will decrease.
